attributes.action: ensure that Icesave customers are treated fairly in comparison to those of other collapsed banks, by having their accounts transferred to another bank, rather than being made to claim the money back from FSCS, which will take months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Icesave Customers are the only ones being required to claim from the FSCS and wait months to access their money.  Customers of all other failed banks have been able to operate their accounts again very quickly under the management of another bank.  This is discriminatory and unfair, and seems completely pointless now that the Chancellor has announced that all the personal deposits are to be honoured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
